name: Flicky
overview: A parent bird's job is never done! Flicky need your help! His Chirps are trapped in farm houses and they may soon become the lunch of roaming cats unless they are rescued ASAP! Control Flicky's movements across each house to pick up the lost Chirps and guide them to the exit. The more Chirps you save, the higher your score! But be careful of cats who are not willing to let their little snacks escape so easily! You can throw objects at cats to kick them out of the house, but they will return mere seconds later! How many Chirps can you rescue?
